statements: UPDATE therapist_client_messaging SET message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND client_id = 1;
UPDATE therapist_client_messaging SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, message = 'Don't forget to attend your appointment!' WHERE client_id = 2;
UPDATE therapist_client_messaging SET message = 'New important message' WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND client_id = 1;
UPDATE therapist_client_messaging SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, message = 'Updated message for client' WHERE client_id = 2 AND therapist_id = 1;
UPDATE therapists SET therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE therapist_id = 1;
UPDATE clients SET client_email = 'john.doe@example.com', therapist_id = 2 WHERE client_id = 3;
UPDATE therapists SET therapist_name = 'John Doe', therapist_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE therapist_id = 1;
UPDATE clients SET client_email = 'jane.smith@example.com', therapist_id = 2, client_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE client_id = 3;
UPDATE therapists SET name='Dr. Smith', specialty='Psychiatry' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE clients SET age=35, therapist_id=2 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE therapists SET name='John Doe', specialty='Psychiatrist' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE clients SET age=30, therapist_id=2 WHERE id=5;
UPDATE therapist SET last_name = 'Doe', first_name = 'John' WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE client SET email = 'jane@example.com', password = 'securepassword' WHERE client_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE therapist SET email = 'updated_email@example.com', first_name = 'Updated', last_name = 'Therapist' WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE therapist SET name='Mark Smith', email='mark.smith@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE client SET age=35, therapist_id=2 WHERE name='Alice Johnson';
UPDATE therapist SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE message SET is_read=true WHERE receiver_id=2 AND sender_id=3;
